column7: 2015. bettie was a member of st. matthew lutheran church in huber heights and was a member of the lutheran womens missionary league and was also very involved in the northmont lions club. she loved to do all kinds of arts and crafts
column10: and crocheting. she also had a green thumb and kept a garden
column11: and also was a good baker. she is survived by her husband of 53 years: thomas a. petrock of englewood
column22: along with numerous relatives and friends. she was preceded in death by her parents: basil and alice (maniply) ambler. funeral services will be held at 12:00 p. m. on friday
column24: 2015 at the kindred funeral home (400 union blvd
column25: englewood). the family will receive friends on friday
column26: from 10:00 a. m. until the time of services. interment will be held at fairview cemetery. if desired
column27: memorial contributions may be made to northmont lions club. online condolences may be made to the family at www. kindred. funeralhome. com upcoming events. visitationjun 12. 10:00 am - 12:00 pm kindred funeral home400 union boulevard. englewood
